channel.title: Adding mods or admins
channel.description:
im co owner of a serv, but i dont know the commands to make a player a mod or admin
some one please post here to help =]]]
btw im on a silab server

item.title: Adding mods or admins
item.dc:creator: @Narubia Narubia
item.description:
@Narubia wrote:

well, if you have the server files on your computer you can make them admin like this:

go into your source folder, and look for a folder called chars or characters or something along those lines, and youll see a whole buncha text files, open the one with the name of the character you wanna admin or mod, and look for this playerrights = * and change to any number tween 1-3

0-normal
1-mod
2-admin
3-owner/co(methinks)
4-hiddin admin(methinks)

Read full topic

item.title: Adding mods or admins
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

If your co-owner of a server, you can’t… Unless the owner has made a command for co-owners/admins Example: ::givemod

::giveadmin…

You need to be the owner…

Read full topic
